records.QueryText: Farmer needs information regarding registration of USSD Application?
records.KccAns: Recommended for registration of USSD -you have been registered for USSD Application from kisaan call center, after registration you will receive message of USSD during 2-7 days on your mobile, then please dial *491*103# for more information about agriculture on your mobile but government provide this facility first 10 lack farmer for free and after 2 years government take charge 6 Rs. Per month. If u want continoue this facility so you will pay charge for this facility.
25 se 28 novomber tak mausam me badal bane rahane ki sambhawana hai , 29 aur 30 ko halki bunda bandi ki sambhawana hai
